author: timbeiko
content: Will upload the recording later today, but FYI to those not on the call today, we're moving these calls to a fortnightly cadence -> next one is on Mar 21, not 14. Also note that DST will be over in many regions by then, so double check the local time üï∞Ô∏è  https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/739

author: timbeiko
content: With DST ending, a few of us on the EF side actually have a conflict with the call starting March 21st. Would anyone mind if make the call 30m earlier? For North America, it will end up 30m later than now given the time change.
